name: Martha Palmer
content: Martha Palmer Martha Palmer Department of Linguistics University of Colorado Boulder Home Research & Projects Publications Teaching Short Bio Curriculum Vitae Students Links An Arts and Sciences Professor of Distinction for Linguistics and the Engineering Helen & Hubert Croft Endowed Professor of Computer Science An ACL Fellow Director of the Linguistic Institute 2011 A Faculty Fellow of the Institute of Cognitive Science Co-Director of CLEAR Supervisor of the Human Language Technology Program Director of the Professional MS in Computational linguistics, Analytics, Search, and Informatics (CLASIC) Mailing Address: Department of Linguistics University of Colorado at Boulder 295 UCB Boulder, Colorado 80309-0295 Office: Hellems Email: martha.palmer AT colorado.edu Phone: (303) 492-1300 Fax: (303) 492-4416
